full_summary:
### Invitation to Tender: Renovations to Government of Canada Building in Gander, NL

**Reference Number:** cb-959-14290704
**Solicitation Number:** M1000-5-0862
**Tender Closing Date:** June 25, 2024, at 13:00:00

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) intends to retain a contractor to provide construction services for interior renovations to a Government of Canada building in Gander, Newfoundland and Labrador. The contractor must complete the work within 12 months from the date of contract award.

This is a two-phase selection process. Bidders responding to this invitation must submit a bid in two phases. Please refer to the attached invitation to tender document for details.

**Selection Criteria:**

* Phase One Qualifications: The requirements will be evaluated on a pass or fail basis. Failure to meet any or all of the Phase One mandatory requirements will render the Phase One bid non-responsive.
* Phase Two Price: Submissions will be evaluated against the Phase Two mandatory requirements. Failure to comply with any or all of the Phase Two mandatory requirements will render the Phase Two bid non-responsive.

The responsive Phase Two bid with the lowest price will be recommended for contract award.

**Submissions:**

* Tender submissions must be made to the RCMP's Bid Receiving Unit at ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* For more information, please refer to the attached tender documents.

**Security Requirements:**

* The successful Bidder's personnel, as well as any subcontractor and its personnel, who are required to perform any part of the work pursuant to the subsequent contract must meet the mandatory security requirements as indicated in the attached invitation to tender document.

**Indigenous Procurement:**

* The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous business capacity. Having a business profile in the IBD will increase your company’s visibility and may provide additional business opportunities.

**Note:**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.

Please send any enquiries or requests for clarification to the Contracting Authority, Sandra Bremner, at Sandra.Bremner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. Enquiries should be received no later than 5
